summary: One person stand-alone followers, and add.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#cc0000]First of all, I do not speak English.
We have to create a sentence using the machine translation.[/color][/size]





[color=#ffff00][size=4]What is this?[/size][/color]
This MOD will add a stand-alone followers "Yunon".
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75983-5-1468306380.jpg[/img]




Currently, you can choose from the version of the two types of the body.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75983-0-1468581333.jpg[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75983-1-1468578696.jpg[/img]






[color=#ffff00][size=4]Trailer① 4:00 ~[/size][/color] [color=#e06666] [size=4]Author "TheWorldofRipX" Thank you for the nice video![/size][/color]
[youtube]i46xPSk0aRM[/youtube]


[color=#ffff00][size=4]Trailer② 1:38 ~[/size][/color] [color=#e06666] [size=4]Author "VatiWah " Thank you for the nice video![/size][/color]
[youtube]R0QaP7E8BjE[/youtube]




She, the player with us as well, alone among the few that survived the Herugen,
Since I'm wondering whether you choose the kind of blessing in front of the Standing Stones,
By all means, please give invited to adventure.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75983-1-1464653025.jpg[/img]



[color=#ffff00][size=4]Character details[/size][/color]
Name: Yunon
Body Type: CBBE TBBP and UNP TBBP
LV: 1 ~ 81 (Synchronized to the player.)
Combat style: Close combat (One hand, two hands, blook) And light armor, heavy armor
Whereabouts: The Warrior Stone




[color=#ffff00][size=4]It is not required, but would like to recommend MOD[/size][/color]

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url] by HydrogensaysHDT

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26664/?]Ancient Nord Chainmail CBBE HDT[/url] by TheGreenLion and ChronoTrigger77





[color=#ffff00][size=4]Weapons and armor were used in the screen shot.[/size][/color]

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26664/?]Ancient Nord Chainmail CBBE HDT[/url]by TheGreenLion and ChronoTrigger77

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69980/?]Steel Bikini Armor V2[/url] by someone and kofman77 

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40473/?]Granite Maul[/url] by johnskyrim

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26305/?]Osare Panty - UNP[/url] by anano
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53262/?]Osare Panty CBBE TBBP with Bodyslide[/url]by Sylis

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13004/?]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url] by MAK

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url] by ChronoTrigger77

・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/?]Grimoas Scarf and Gugel[/url] by Grimoa



[color=#ff00ff][size=4]<Credits>[/size][/color] Thank you for the wonderful MOD!

Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team

Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy

KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Ousnius and Caliente

BodySlide and Outfit Studio by Ousnius and Caliente

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99

UNP HDT-PE BBP TBBP by Turbosundance

Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by ChronoTrigger77

Mikan Eyes by nerune

XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS by xp32

Vanilla Outfits BodySlided (with HDT-PE) for CBBE by Gosthy

Steel Bikini Armor V2 by someone and kofman77
